testsuite.name: com.test.shridhara.WebAutomation.Scenario1Test
testsuite.system-out: Opening URL http://automationpractice.com/index.php Clicking on T-shirt link Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //*[@id='block_top_menu']/ul/li[3]/a Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: (//ul[@class='product_list grid row']//li)[1] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //p[@id='add_to_cart'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //a[@title='Proceed to checkout'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //span[text()='Proceed to checkout'] Entering valuetestuser1@mail.com Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //input[@id='email'] Entering value123456 Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //*[@id='passwd'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //*[@id='SubmitLogin'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //span[text()='Proceed to checkout'] Successfully displayed Shipping tab Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //button//span[contains(text(),'Proceed to checkout')] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //a[@class='cheque'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //button[@type='submit']/span[text()='I confirm my order'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //div[@class='box order-confirmation'] Order id is AGUQTASIA Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //div[@class='header_user_info']/a[@class='account'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //span[text()='Order history and details'] Finding element with locatorBy.xpath: //a[@class='color-myaccount'] Orders found in histiry page [AGUQTASIA, TNBPUGRZS, PMMNQNFBV, ENCUOXHVE, PVIRKRWSV, BWIBVLYXW, CLEDNGHGF, BDOEGIOUU, LSRLACMUF, SJZLECAJY, ITNLQFTOF, UJOVPNPEP] ............Successfully verifed order.................
